sentences.sContent: But, to doing this loses the significance of emigration.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, to doing this loses the significance of emigration.
sentences.sCn: 但是，这样做就失去了移民的意义。

sentences.sContent: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.sCn: 他们了解殖民、革命还有移民。

synos.tran: 移民；移民出境；移居外国
